statements: SELECT * FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses;
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours > 3 AND course_description LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY course_credit_hours DESC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours >= 3 AND course_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY course_credit_hours ASC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_credit_hours FROM courses WHERE course_credit_hours IN (2, 4) ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name FROM course_schedule WHERE course_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM course_schedule WHERE instructor_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT course_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, course_description FROM course_schedule INNER JOIN course_catalog ON course_schedule.course_id = course_catalog.course_id;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, schedule_time FROM course_schedule ORDER BY schedule_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday';
SELECT course_name, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule ORDER BY instructor DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT course_name FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id > 100 ORDER BY course_name;
SELECT instructor, course_name, schedule_day FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_time BETWEEN '08:00:00' AND '12:00:00';
SELECT student_id, registration_date FROM Registration ORDER BY registration_date DESC;
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT course_name, instructor, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM CourseSchedule WHERE schedule_day = 'Monday' ORDER BY schedule_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Registration WHERE registration_date >= '2022-09-01' AND registration_date <= '2022-09-30';
SELECT course_id, course_name, instructor, schedule_day FROM CourseSchedule WHERE instructor LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY schedule_day DESC;
SELECT topic, credits, prerequisites FROM CatalogInformation WHERE credits >= 3 AND topic LIKE '%Science%';
SELECT * FROM Course;
SELECT instructor_name, department_id FROM Instructor;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT student_name FROM Student ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Department WHERE department_name LIKE 'Math%';
SELECT * FROM Course WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Course WHERE course_name LIKE '%Math%';
SELECT department_name, COUNT(instructor_id) AS num_instructors FROM Department JOIN Instructor ON Department.department_id = Instructor.department_id GROUP BY department_name;
SELECT student_name, course_name FROM Student JOIN Course ON Student.course_id = Course.course_id WHERE Student.student_id = 3;
SELECT instructor_name, department_name FROM Instructor JOIN Department ON Instructor.department_id = Department.department_id ORDER BY department_name, instructor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM course_catalog;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_catalog;
SELECT course_id, professor_id, schedule_day FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_time >= '09:00:00';
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM student WHERE student_major = 'Computer Science';
SELECT professor_name, professor_department FROM professor ORDER BY professor_name ASC;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM course_catalog;
SELECT professor_name, professor_department FROM professor WHERE professor_department = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, student_major FROM student ORDER BY student_major ASC;

SELECT course_name, professor_name, registration_date FROM registration JOIN course_catalog ON registration.course_id = course_catalog.course_id JOIN professor ON registration.student_id = professor.professor_id;
SELECT course_name, schedule_day, schedule_time FROM course_schedule WHERE schedule_day IN ('Monday', 'Wednesday', 'Friday') ORDER BY schedule_time DESC;
